text: I Ought to Be in Pictures is a 1982 American comedy drama movie directed by Herbert Ross and based on the 1980 play of the same name by Neil Simon. It stars Walter Matthau, Ann-Margaret, Dinah Manoff, Lance Guest, Larry Barton, David Faustino, Martin Ferrero, Michael Dudikoff and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about writers
title: I Ought to Be in Pictures (movie)
